name: Khadija Irfan
bio: Khadija Irfan is a social butterfly with a deep-rooted passion for mathematics, and AI. She is involved in several community building runs and thrives in a collaborative environment. She is an alumnus of the International Student Undergraduate Research Experience at the University of Notre Dame and is currently the Google Developer Student Clubs lead at FAST Islamabad. She teaches mathematics, and computer science to undergraduates and high school students. Another one of her endeavors includes providing professional CVs, and LinkedIn building sessions.  At VECTOR Inc. she thoroughly enjoys active research and is immensely engaged in the technology industry emerging as an influential figure in her circle. She aims to be a creative professional in Artificial Intelligence working on Intelligent Agents where she will be involved in bringing about innovative new ventures, products, and opportunities for the tech space around her.  You can catch her at the office making reels, coding, or on a coffee run with her product team :D.
